pages.md:
# For Customers Using iOS

An Apple Lightning to USB Camera Adapter is required.

!Connection Diagram

1. Set the camera’s **CONNECTION SETTING > USB POWER SUPPLY SETTING** to OFF.

2. Connect the camera and smartphone using a USB cable. The “Photos” app will automatically start and allow you to import photos and movies to your smartphone.

> 💡 **Note:**  
> The desired results cannot be achieved with a USB Type-C-to-Lightning cable. Use a camera adapter.
